description:
But first, four years ago they were briefly ranked as the number one team in the world. Last year, they were a penalty shootout away from a World Cup final. Next year Netherlands will be watching the European Championships from home. Despite the tournament being extended from 16 to 24 teams and despite 28 teams still being involved with playoffs to come. Netherlands 3-2 defeat Czech Republic means they finish fourth in the group, five points off third spot and seven off the guaranteed qualification spots. Czech Republic, Iceland and Turkey all finished above them. Dutch journalist Stephen Volkmann says the side thinks too highly of itself. Rory Smith of Britain The Times newspaper says it's obvious there are many problems.

This has been coming for a long time. I think what's really interesting is that in 2007 the Dut won the 21's, the European 21 Championships. I think of that squad only two have become regular internationals and that suggests to me a wasted generation.

title: 每况愈下的荷兰队（有声）

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

《Lost Stars》是一首由Adam Levine演唱的歌曲，Adam Levine参演电影《歌曲改变人生》，作为电影《歌曲改变人生》的宣传单。2015年1月15日，《Lost Stars》获第87届奥斯卡金像奖最佳原创歌曲提名。

Adam Levine，出生在美国加利福尼亚州洛杉矶。他的父母是德国人。除了作为魔力红的主唱进行演唱活动之外，他也进行个人的音乐活动。时髦，性感，活泼的Adam无疑是魔力的耀眼红心。《人物》杂志评之为2013年世界最性感男人。

讲解：

模唱部分：

Please don't see
Just a boy caught up in dreams and fantasies
Please see me
Reaching out for someone I can't see
Take my hand，let's see where we wake up tomorrow
Best laid plans sometimes are just a one night stand
I'd be damned，Cupid's demanding back his arrow
So let's get drunk on our tears

And God, tell us the reason
Youth is wasted on the young
It's hunting season
And the lambs are on the run
Searching for the meaning
But are we all lost stars, trying to light up the dark?

Who are we? Just a spec of dust within the galaxy
Who is me，if we're not careful turns into reality
But don't you dare let all these memories bring you sorrow？
Yesterday I saw a lion kiss a deer
Turn the page maybe we'll find a blank new ending
Where we're dancing in our tears

And God, tell us the reason
Youth is wasted on the young
It's hunting season
And the lambs are on the run

Searching for the meaning

But are we all lost stars, trying to light up the dark?

I thought i saw u out there crying
I thought i heard u call my name
I thought i heard u out there crying
oh just the same

模唱：
